job_tasks.phrase: coordinate all the activities related to developing new exams, translating existing exams to several different languages, updating the exams to current standards during maintenance, and implementing exam products in the various systems.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the coordination and implementation of products (exams) within various systems, which aligns with the integration aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: collaborate closely with the Exam Developers to integrate generative AI solutions into our processes.
job_tasks.justification: This directly mentions integrating AI solutions into existing processes, a core task of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: translate internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the process of creating machine learning algorithms based on specific guidelines, which falls under model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Coordinating work with subject matter experts and cooperating with third parties in creating, localizing, implementing and maintaining exam products
job_tasks.justification: This describes the coordination and maintenance of products, which is a software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensuring that deliverables are in line with high-quality standards, are within budget, and delivered on time
job_tasks.justification: This relates to the project management and delivery aspects of software development, ensuring quality and timeliness.

job_tasks.phrase: (Co)developing and improving exam products in line with guidelines for educational measurement
job_tasks.justification: This involves the development and improvement of products based on specific guidelines, which can be interpreted as model development in an educational context.

job_tasks.phrase: Testing exam products (exams and corresponding materials) for the other team members
job_tasks.justification: Testing is a fundamental part of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms complying with standards, best practices and company policies
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the creation and upkeep of machine learning algorithms, fitting the definition of model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Supporting our Customer Success Center by preparing responses to customer questions on the content of the exams
job_tasks.justification: While customer-facing, preparing responses based on product content can be seen as a form of product support and documentation, related to the integration and maintenance of the product.

job_tasks.phrase: Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions
job_tasks.justification: Issue detection, root cause analysis, and corrective actions are standard practices in software maintenance and quality assurance.

job_tasks.phrase: Keeping your knowledge in the domain up-to-date
job_tasks.justification: This relates to understanding the business domain to perform the role effectively.
This is a broader professional activity that supports the company's presence and can be linked to product promotion and integration into the market.

job_tasks.phrase: stay up to date with the latest research and developments in the field of AI and machine learning.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a need to understand and potentially apply new AI/ML techniques, which is part of model development and staying current in the field.

job_tasks.phrase: maintaining legal, qualitative and ethical compliance in the outcomes.
job_tasks.justification: This refers to understanding and adhering to business and ethical standards in the output of the work.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on software development and integration tasks (Macro-Category A), such as coordinating activities, implementing products, testing, and maintaining systems. While it mentions translating guidelines into 'machine learning algorithms' and staying updated on AI/ML research, these are presented as enhancements or integrations into existing processes rather than the core focus of building and training complex AI models from scratch. The primary output appears to be exam products that are enhanced by AI, not AI models themselves. Therefore, it aligns best with an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer role.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines a mix of traditional software development/coordination tasks and the integration of AI. The AI aspects are mentioned but not as the primary focus of deep model development. The tasks are well-defined, allowing for a confident classification. A score of 4 reflects high confidence, with a slight deduction because the AI tasks are described in a way that could be interpreted slightly differently depending on the depth of 'translating guidelines into machine learning algorithms'.
